SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R.* FROM (
SELECT R.ID R_ID ,R.MEMBER_ID R_MEMBER_ID ,R.BODY R_BODY , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') - TO_CHAR((R.REGIST_DATE),'yyyymmdd') = 0 THEN TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'hh24:ss')
WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') - TO_CHAR((R.REGIST_DATE),'yyyy') >= 1 THEN TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
ELSE TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'MM-DD') END as REGIST_DATE ,R.PARENT_REPLY_ID ,R_M.NICKNAME FROM REPLY R, ARTICLE A, MEMBER R_M, MEMBER A_M WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = A_M.ID AND R.MEMBER_ID = R_M.ID AND R.ARTICLE_ID = A.ID AND A.ID = #{id} ) R WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow}
SELECT A.ID ID , COUNT(A.ID) COUNT FROM REPLY R, ARTICLE A WHERE R.ARTICLE_ID = A.ID GROUP BY A.ID
SELECT COUNT(A.ID) FROM REPLY R, ARTICLE A WHERE R.ARTICLE_ID = A.ID AND A.ID = #{id}
